about.title: About
about.primary: Connect your data once. Moss indexes, packages, and distributes it so semantic search runs where intelligence happens:
about.secondary: in-browser, on the edge, or in the cloud.

livekitMossVoiceAgent.title: Livekit-Moss-Voice-Agent
livekitMossVoiceAgent.subtitle: Real-time Voice Intelligence
livekitMossVoiceAgent.description: Experience the future of conversational AI with our LiveKit-Moss Voice Agent. This innovative solution combines real-time voice communication with intelligent semantic search capabilities, enabling natural and context-aware conversations.
features: Real-time Processing: Instant voice recognition and response generation
Semantic Understanding: Context-aware responses powered by Moss
Scalable Architecture: Built for enterprise-grade performance

talkToYourPdf.title: TalkToYourPdf
talkToYourPdf.subtitle: Intelligent Document Conversations
talkToYourPdf.description: TalkToYourPdf revolutionizes how you interact with documents. Upload any PDF and engage in natural conversations about its content. Our AI understands context, extracts key information, and provides accurate answers to your questions.
features: Document Analysis: Advanced PDF parsing and content extraction
Natural Queries: Ask questions in plain language about your documents
Context Awareness: Understands document structure and relationships

inpersonaAgent.title: InpersonaAgent
inpersonaAgent.subtitle: Personalized AI Experiences
inpersonaAgent.description: InpersonaAgent enables you to create custom AI personas that adapt to your specific needs. Whether it's customer support, content creation, or specialized assistance, our platform allows you to build intelligent agents that understand your domain and provide relevant responses.
features: Custom Personas: Build AI agents tailored to your specific requirements
Domain Expertise: Train agents on your specific knowledge base
Seamless Integration: Easy deployment across multiple platforms

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: This is where you can describe about your contact. The more you describe about your contact, the more chances you have!
